sense.def:
Besedo
either
postavimo pred prvo od dveh možnosti, kadar navajamo edini možnosti ali izbiri, ki sta na voljo. Druga možnost je predstavljena z
or
.

seg.quote: I was expecting you either today or tomorrow.
You either love him or you hate him.

sense.def:
Besedo
either
lahko uporabimo pri zanikanju pred prvo od dveh možnosti, kadar poudarimo, da se zanikanje nanaša na obe možnosti.

seg.quote: Dr Kirk, you're not being either frank or fair.
I wouldn't dream of asking either Mary or my mother to take on the responsibility.

sense.def:
Either
se nanaša na eno od dveh možnoh stvari, kadar želimo povedati, da ni pomembno, katero izberemo.

Either
lahko uporabimo tudi pri zanikanju in se nanaša na vsako od obeh stvari, kadar želimo poudariti, da zanikanje velja za obe.

seg.quote: ‘Which one do you want?’—‘I don't want either.’
She could not see either man.

sense.def:
Either
uporabljamo samostojno na koncu negativne trditve, če želimo povedati, da obstaja podobnost ali zveza med osebo ali predmetom, ki smo ga pravkar omenili, in tistim, ki je bil omenjen že prej.

seg.quote: ‘I haven't got that address.’—‘No, I haven't got it either.’
Not only was he ugly, he was not very interesting either.

sense.def:
Either
lahko uporabimo pred samostalnikom, ki se nanaša na dve stvari, kadar govorimo o obeh.

seg.quote: The two ladies sat in large armchairs on either side of the stage.
In either case the answer is the same.
